A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I realize this movie was divisive between fans. But for me\, I thought it was a great and fresh story where I honestly did not know what was going to happen next. Not nearly as predictable as its previous installment. I shed tears at points at how well they had honored my childhood\, though as many will agree the ending just hurt too much. Even so\, a wonderful film and welcome addition to the star wars saga. I definitely recommend seeing this and I will need to rewatch a dozen times to take in every detail.
